sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO md_migr_dependency ( id , connection_id_fk , parent_id , child_id , parent_object_type , child_object_type , security_group_id , created_on , created_by , last_updated_on , last_updated_by ) VALUES ( #id# , #connectionIdFk# , #parentId# , #childId# , #parentObjectType# , #childObjectType# , #securityGroupId# , #createdOn# , #createdBy# , #lastUpdatedOn# , #lastUpdatedBy# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE md_migr_dependency SET id = #id# , connection_id_fk = #connectionIdFk# , parent_id = #parentId# , child_id = #childId# , parent_object_type = #parentObjectType# , child_object_type = #childObjectType# , security_group_id = #securityGroupId# , created_on = #createdOn# , created_by = #createdBy# , last_updated_on = #lastUpdatedOn# , last_updated_by = #lastUpdatedBy# WHERE 1 = 1 AND id = #id#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM md_migr_dependency WHERE 1 = 1 AND id = #id#
sqlMap.select: SELECT id , connection_id_fk , parent_id , child_id , parent_object_type , child_object_type , security_group_id , created_on , created_by , last_updated_on , last_updated_by FROM MD_MIGR_DEPENDENCY WHERE id = #id#

SELECT A.ID , A.CONNECTION_ID_FK , A.PARENT_ID , A.CHILD_ID , A.PARENT_OBJECT_TYPE , A.CHILD_OBJECT_TYPE , A.SECURITY_GROUP_ID , A.CREATED_ON , A.CREATED_BY , A.LAST_UPDATED_ON , A.LAST_UPDATED_BY FROM ( SELECT ID , CONNECTION_ID_FK , PARENT_ID , CHILD_ID , PARENT_OBJECT_TYPE , CHILD_OBJECT_TYPE , SECURITY_GROUP_ID , CREATED_ON , CREATED_BY , LAST_UPDATED_ON , LAST_UPDATED_BY , ROWNUM FROM MD_MIGR_DEPENDENCY WHERE 1=1
ID = #searchKeyword#
CONNECTION_ID_FK LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY ID DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# AND #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM MD_MIGR_DEPENDENCY WHERE 1=1
ID = #searchKeyword#
CONNECTION_ID_FK LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
